definitions.definition: To question harshly in an attempt to find or reveal weaknesses .
To insult , tease , make fun of or badger , especially during a comedy performance.
examples: Promise that you won't heckle me after my performance.

definitions.definition: To prepare flax for spinning using special combs called hackles .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To question harshly in an attempt to find or reveal weaknesses . [from later 18th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To insult , tease , make fun of or badger , especially during a comedy performance.
( textiles ) To prepare flax for spinning using special combs called hackles .
